description.zh-cn: 中国人口、资源与环境经济学家，吉林大学教授、博士生导师、校友及前副校长。他也是中国共产党党员，并曾担任国务院学位委员会学科评议组成员、中国人口学会副会长、中国高等教育学会常务理事。
description.en: A Chinese economist specializing in population, resources, and environmental economics. He is a professor, doctoral supervisor, alumnus, and former vice president of Jilin University. He is also a member of the Communist Party of China and has served as a member of the Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council's disciplinary review group, vice president of the China Population Association, and an executive council member of the China Association of Higher Education.

en: Academic Degrees Committee of the State Council

description.en: Wang Shengjin is from Panshi, Jilin.
